title: "Checkpoint 4"
author: "Katya Kelly, Katja McKiernan"
date: "November 17, 2017"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(ggmap)
centerSanFran <- get_map(location = "san francisco",
    color = "color",
    source = "google",
    maptype = "satellite",
    zoom = 4)

centerAnchorage <- get_map(location = "anchorage",
    color = "color",
    source = "google",
    maptype = "satellite",
    zoom = 4)

ggmap(centerSanFran,
    extent = "device",
    ylab = "Latitude",
    xlab = "Longitude")

ggmap(centerAnchorage,
    extent = "device",
    ylab = "Latitude",
    xlab = "Longitude")


```
